councilR 0.1.0
  • Reference

Council colors

colors.Rd

A named list of Council colors for each division, Metro Transit, Play Features, and MetroStats in Hex code format

colors

Format

A list of 29 character objects

councilBlue

Council blue

cdGreen

Community Development green

mtsRed

Metropolitan Transportation Services red

esBlue

Environmental Services blue

transitBlue

Metro Transit blue

transitRed

Metro Transit red

transitYellow

Metro Transit yellow

suppYellow

Supplementary yellow

suppBlack

Supplmentary black

suppGray

Supplementary gray

suppWhite

Supplementary white

metroGreen

Green Line green

transitGold

Gold Line gold

metroGray

Lettered line gray

metroOrange

Orange Line orange

playGreen

Play Features green, a slight variation on cdGreen

playBlue

Play Features blue, a slight variation on councilBlue

playLiBlue

Play Features light blue

playDaBlue

Play Features dark blue

playSalmon

Play Features salmon, or pink

playYellow

Play Features yellow

metrostatsBlue

Metro Stats blue

metrostatsRed

Metro Stats red

metrostatsDaPurple

Metro Stats dark purple

metrostatsMePurple

Metro Stats medium purple

metrostatsLiPurple

Metro Stats light purple

metrostatsPink

Metro Stats pink

metrostatsTan

Metro stats tan

Source

https://www.metrotransit.org/Data/Sites/1/media/logos/brand_standards.pdf

See also

Other aesthetics: council_theme()

Examples

colors$councilBlue
#> [1] "#0054A4"
